results.title: Effects of Antidiabetic Drugs on Muscle Mass in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To comparatively examine the effects of GLP-1RAs and oral antidiabetic drugs, including @GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@SGLT2@@@ inhibitors and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, on @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@muscle mass@@@ and body weight in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ via a network meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials.

citations.NLM: Ida S, Kaneko R, Imataka K, Okubo K, Shirakura Y, Azuma K, Fujiwara R, Murata K. Effects of Antidiabetic Drugs on Muscle Mass in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus. Curr Diabetes Rev. 2021;17(3):293-303. PMID: 32628589
citations.BibTeX: @article{32628589, title={Effects of Antidiabetic Drugs on Muscle Mass in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.}, author={Ida S and Kaneko R and Imataka K and Okubo K and Shirakura Y and Azuma K and Fujiwara R and Murata K}, journal={Curr Diabetes Rev}, volume={17}, number={3}, pages={293-303}}

results.title: Metformin ameliorates body mass gain and early metabolic changes in ovariectomized rats
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ ameliorates @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@body mass gain@@@ and early metabolic changes in ovariectomized rats

results.title: Flutamide-metformin plus ethinylestradiol-drospirenone for lipolysis and antiatherogenesis in young women with ovarian hyperandrogenism: the key role of metformin at the start and after more than one year of therapy.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Flutamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005485 @@@Flutamide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Flutamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005485 @@@Flu@@@)-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@Met@@@) with @CHEMICAL_drospirenone_and_ethinyl_estradiol_combination @CHEMICAL_MESH:C534342 @@@ethinylestradiol-drospirenone@@@ is a combination therapy that reduces the total and abdominal fat excess, diminishes the lean @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@mass deficit@@@, and attenuates the dysadipocytokinemia of young and nonobese @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Ovarian_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D010049 @@@ovarian hyperandrogenism@@@, a variant of @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Ibáñez L, de Zegher F. Flutamide-metformin plus ethinylestradiol-drospirenone for lipolysis and antiatherogenesis in young women with ovarian hyperandrogenism: the key role of metformin at the start and after more than one year of therapy. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2005 Jan;90(1):39-43. PMID: 15483105
citations.BibTeX: @article{15483105, title={Flutamide-metformin plus ethinylestradiol-drospirenone for lipolysis and antiatherogenesis in young women with ovarian hyperandrogenism: the key role of metformin at the start and after more than one year of therapy.}, author={Ibáñez L and de Zegher F}, journal={J Clin Endocrinol Metab}, volume={90}, number={1}, pages={39-43}}

results.title: Role of Metformin on Osteoblast Differentiation in Type 2 Diabetes
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, an effective hypoglycemic, can modulate different points of @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@malignant mass@@@, @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@), @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@, @DISEASE_Tuberculosis @DISEASE_MESH:D014376 @@@tuberculosis@@@, and nerve regeneration.

citations.NLM: Jiating L, Buyun J, Yinchang Z. Role of Metformin on Osteoblast Differentiation in Type 2 Diabetes Biomed Res Int. 2019;2019():9203934. PMID: 31886264

results.title: Melatonin potentiates the effects of metformin on glucose metabolism and food intake in high-fat-fed rats
results.text_hl: To assess whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@body mass loss@@@ is exclusively due to its anorectic effects will require additional experiments of pair-feeding.

citations.NLM: Dantas-Ferreira RF, Raingard H, Dumont S, Schuster-Klein C, Guardiola-Lemaitre B, Pevet P, Challet E. Melatonin potentiates the effects of metformin on glucose metabolism and food intake in high-fat-fed rats Endocrinol Diabetes Metab. 2018 Oct;1(4):e00039. PMID: 30815567

results.title: Evaluation of a general practitioner-led cardiometabolic clinic: Physical health profile and treatment outcomes for clients on clozapine.
results.text_hl: At the first appointment, the majority of clients had @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@ that was mostly left untreated; many of these clients were commenced on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. The outcomes are positive, and show that the majority of clients lost weight (82.5%) and had a @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@reduction@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@body mass@@@ index (84.6%); nearly half (44.4%) had a @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@reduction@@@ in waist @DISEASE_Abidi_X_linked_mental_retardation_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C535556 @@@circumference@@@.

citations.NLM: Coates D, Woodford P, Higgins O, Grover D. Evaluation of a general practitioner-led cardiometabolic clinic: Physical health profile and treatment outcomes for clients on clozapine. Int J Ment Health Nurs. 2018 Feb;27(1):303-310. PMID: 28233407
citations.BibTeX: @article{28233407, title={Evaluation of a general practitioner-led cardiometabolic clinic: Physical health profile and treatment outcomes for clients on clozapine.}, author={Coates D and Woodford P and Higgins O and Grover D}, journal={Int J Ment Health Nurs}, volume={27}, number={1}, pages={303-310}}
